title: Courtois rubbishes Real Madrid rumours
text:
Courtois rubbishes Real Madrid rumours Getty Images 0 14-Mar-2017 17:28:09 The former Atletico shot-stopper has been linked with a transfer back to La Liga, though he was cool over the suggestions 
Chelsea goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois has dismissed claims that he could move in the summer to Real Madrid. 
Courtois: Mou made United dirty 
Keylor Navas is having a tough time in goal at the Bernabeu currently, having been at fault for the strike that Real Betis scored at the weekend. As such, speculation is mounting that the European champions could make a change in that area, with Belgium international Courtois one of the players cited in connection with Zinedine Zidane’s men. 
The 24-year-old previously played with Atletico Madrid in La Liga, but is not thinking about a move back to Spain. 
Speaking to Onda Cero , he said: “No, I’m not planning on moving. I’m enjoying the success here and I am focused.” 
Courtois was speaking after Antonio Conte’s men defeated Manchester United in an FA Cup quarter-final 1-0 at Stamford Bridge, booking a London derby with Tottenham in the semi-finals next month. Related
